/**
 * ScandiPWA - Progressive Web App for Magento
 *
 * Copyright © Scandiweb, Inc. All rights reserved.
 * See LICENSE for license details.

 * @license OSL-3.0 (Open Software License ("OSL") v. 3.0)

export const INTERSECTION_RATIO = 0.5;
